H0.text: referring to the organs of reproduction is called. Genital System

H1.text: referring to the organs of reproduction is called. Sexual Organs

H2.text: referring to the organs of reproduction is called. Procreative Apparatus

H3.text: referring to the organs of reproduction is called. Reproductive system

A4.text: The reproductive system of an organism, also known as the genital system, is the biological system made up of all the anatomical organs involved in sexual reproduction.

A5.text: The male reproductive system has one function, and it is to produce and deposit sperm.

A6.text: Sex organs are responsible for producing and transporting gametes, as well as facilitating fertilization and supporting the development and birth of offspring.

A7.text: Sex organs constitute the primary sex characteristics of an organism.
